mainEntity.name: What makes NodeMonkes unique among NFT collections?

acceptedAnswer.text: NodeMonkes distinguishes itself by being one of the few NFT collections inscribed directly on the Bitcoin blockchain using the Ordinals protocol. This offers enhanced security and permanence compared to NFTs on other blockchains.

mainEntity.name: How can I purchase a NodeMonkes NFT?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can purchase NodeMonkes NFTs through the Ordinals Market, where the collection is actively listed and traded.

The Ordinals protocol is a method that allows for the inscription of digital assets directly onto individual satoshis on the Bitcoin blockchain, enabling the creation and ownership of NFTs on Bitcoin.

mainEntity.name: Is NodeMonkes planning any future expansions or features?

acceptedAnswer.text: While specific plans are not publicly detailed, the NodeMonkes team is focused on community engagement, potential cross-chain integrations, and enhancing the utility of their NFTs.

mainEntity.name: How can I stay updated on NodeMonkes developments?

acceptedAnswer.text: Stay connected by following NodeMonkes on X and visiting their official website for the latest news and updates.
